Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [answering the phone] Dunder Mifflin, this is Pam. I'm sorry, he's not in yet. Would you like his voicemail?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [heard yelling from the street] Yeah! Yeah! Yeah, okay! Twelve miles an hour. Eat that, Carl Lewis!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Angela made several 911 calls about cars going too fast in front of the building, so the police put up a radar gun. It's actually caused a bit of a traffic hazard.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [yelling as he runs past the radar gun] Aah!

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Wow, thirteen!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yes!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No. No, no. There was wind.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I was just jogging.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Dwight, there was wind. I want a do-over.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No, no, no, it's not your turn. All right, thirteen is the new number. Oscar, go ahead.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I want another try. Here we go! [Michael runs past the radar as a car passes] Thirty-one! Thirty-one!

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: There was a car.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I was ahead of the car. Thirty-one is my new number.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Thirty-one is humanly impossible.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Go, Oscar. Thirty-one's my number.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: That's impossible.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Beat it!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Today's a big day. My presence has been requested by [in an authoritative voice] Chief Financial Officer, David Wallace. [in normal voice] He says that he wants to talk about big picture stuff. And, I'll be honest, I have little or no idea what that means, so... probably bad.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Quick announcement:

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Andy still doesn't know that Angela's having an affair with Dwight. And it's been seventeen days. I mean, eventually he'll figure it out, when their kids have giant heads and beet-stained teeth. But right now it's just... awkward.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [sighs] How can he still not know?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: We can't figure that out.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I can't take it anymore.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Wait, what? You can't take what?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I am telling Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No. You can't do that. It shouldn't come from you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Who should it come from, then?

Quote.Speaker: Everyone
Quote.Text: [simultaneously] Angela.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [to Dwight] Are you still having intercourse with her? [Dwight's expression implies 'yes']

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: What is wrong with you? She is engaged.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Did you ever have intercourse in this office? [Dwight's expression implies 'yes']

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Are you serious? Ugh. Where? [Dwight stares at Oscar; more forcefully] Where? [Dwight's expression implies 'at your desk'; Oscar's voice breaks] Where, Dwight?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [coolly] Seems like you already know where.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Kevin, you screwed this form up again. The amount owed goes at the top.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't realize I was doing something wrong. If I had, I would've admitted it, and stopped right away.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: That's enough.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Because I wouldn't want an innocent person, who doesn't know anything about the form... [Angela puts headphones on; Kevin looks at Oscar] What?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: That was good... It's just, at the end you weren't saying something that could also apply to the form.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: How about, "I'm sorry I did such a whorish job filling out this form?"

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: There you go.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [on the phone] That cannot be true! [Dwight jumps] You're going to charge me a fee to cut my own cake? Uh, no. No, no, no. What I'm saying is, I want to cut it myself...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [whispering to Jim] Trade seats with me.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I've got a better angle on Pam. I can see everything.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Please stop.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [grabs a spoon from Jim's coffee cup and checks behind him with it] I need a soup spoon.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Rule 17:

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [moves his bobblehead from one side of his nameplate to the other and clears his throat to get Angela's attention]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: What is it?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You've got to tell Andy about us.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: That is a terrible idea. One of your worst.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Get it over with. Then we don't have to hide anymore.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: You're expanding on your worst idea.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Do you love me or not?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I've already admitted that I do. Why do you keep making me repeat it?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Because you're engaged to Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [sighs]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Not yet.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: When?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: When what? [clears throat] When what?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know this can't go on.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What can't go on?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We have to put an end to this.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Seems like...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Come on. [Dwight and Jim follow into Michael's office]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You guys should... be hearing what I'm saying.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: This is really not how this is supposed to happen.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Angela said she was going to tell him. She's just not ready.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: When will she be ready?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I don't know.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Is she crazy in bed?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [boastfully] Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Stop. What?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: How so, specifically?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay, listen.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Eager.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: This shouldn't happen at work.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: And flexible.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: And!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: This shouldn't be coming from his boss. And we should also consider the fact that that man has an anger issue.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: It's too late.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Well it's not too late, because you haven't done anything.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I am already walking.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Michael, once this gets out... I don't know how it's going to go down.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, what does that mean?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Might get ugly.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [sighs] Jim, this has to get out, so we can all deal with it.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: But you're leaving...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [to Michael, who opens the door to leave] Have a good trip.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Thanks. [to Andy] Andy?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Walk with me.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Will do, boss-man.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ohh, I do not have much time... car's all the way over there, to tell you what I have to tell you. And just bear in mind when I say... say these things, that... are bad things... that you hear... in your ears... this is something that I, if I were you, that I wouldn't want to hear...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You're not making any sense.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well... no, I'm not. So I... I'm not very articulate today, so I'll just leave it for another time. Another day.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: All righty.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Which will be fine. I am off!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Have a good meeting!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Thank you! [gets into his car]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [through the car window] Kick Wallace's ass!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [through the car window] Okay. I will... Dwight and Angela are having an affair, so...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I can't hear you through the glass

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [rolls down car window] Dwight and Angela are having an affair. They've been sleeping together for some time. That was the news. I wanted to let you know.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: All right. See you later. [backs out of the parking space] Ahh.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Are you serious?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yep. [drives off]

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: I knew something bad was gonna happen today.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: You said that yesterday.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Yeah, my neighbor got murdered.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [to Dwight] What are you standing for?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: If I'm sitting, I can't disable his neck or his groin.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You're not going to do anything to his neck or his groin.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: If I'm sitting, I don't have the option to.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Dwight, I'm in charge when Michael's gone, and I need you to sit...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [enters the office and walks to Angela] I need to talk to you.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: We can talk right here.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I need to talk to you in private.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: We're not listening.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Let's go to the conference room.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Is it true?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: What have you heard?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: That you're sleeping with Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: That doesn't sound like me.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Is it true?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Andy, I'm engaged to you. I mean, we just signed off on our wedding flowers. Would I have said yes to formal chrysanthemums if I didn't want to get married? And, we went through all that stuff with our wedding cake...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Just answer the question. Are you sleeping with Dwight?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: A little bit.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: How long has it been going on?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I don't know. I mean, we were together, and then he killed sprinkles, and then we stopped, and... I don't know exactly when we started up again.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Who else knows about it?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Michael.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Who else?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [quietly] Let me think about it... I, um... there... [Andy looks over to see everyone watching them]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh God. Come on!

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: So listen, Michael, your branch has been doing great lately, and your sales staff is reporting very strong numbers. Out-performing last year, in fact. Um, and I don't know exactly how to put this, but... what are you doing right?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Right what?

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Utica, Albany, all the other branches are struggling, but your branch is reporting strong numbers. [Michael smiles] Look, you're not our most traditional guy, but clearly, something you are doing... is right. And I just, I need to get a sense of what that is.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: David, here it is. My philosophy is basically this. And this is something that I live by. And I always have. And I always will. Don't ever, for any reason, do anything to anyone, for any reason, ever, no matter what. No matter... where. Or who, or who you are with, or, or where you are going, or... or where you've been... ever. For any reason, whatsoever.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Sometimes I'll start a sentence, and I don't even know where it's going. I just hope I find it along the way. Like an improv conversation. An improversation.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: This is going to sound sort of high-maintenance, but could we have it, like, three degrees cooler in here? I always think better when it's cooler.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Here's the thing. Michael is doing something right. And in this economic climate, no method of success can be ignored. It's not really time for executives to start getting judgmental now. It's Hail Mary time.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [pokes his head in] Hey, what say we order up some pasta?

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: What say we do.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Standard, you know? Nothing fancy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: So like, missionary...

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I said nothing fancy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Do you love him?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I love you.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Why should I believe that?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Andy, we are at a crossroads here. And we can either give in to what people are saying that we're not good together.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Who says that?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Or, we can prove them wrong. Let's prove them wrong.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Where's Dwight?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You okay, man?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No. Not at all, actually. But thanks for asking. Appreciate it. You know what? I'd also like to take this opportunity to thank all of you for lying. To my face. And not telling me what's been going on this entire time.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: You are welcome.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [Dwight enters] Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: It's over.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh good. She broke up with you.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No. It's over between you two.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Uh, no way. I am not giving up.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You have to.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No I don't.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [forcefully] She doesn't love you. She's marrying me.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [angrier] Well I don't know about that, because she certainly seems to enjoy making lovemaking with me.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Angela Bernard.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Will never be her name.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: It will be her name. And you will have to call her that!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I don't think so.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey guys, why don't we, uh, just cool off a bit?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I'm telling you to back down.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: And I'm telling you that I will never back down.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Then I'll make you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh really? How are you gonna do that?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Through the use of force.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That is very general, and does not scare me in the slightest.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I will fight you.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Nope.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay, fine! Good! A duel! The winner gets Angela.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Fine!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Fine!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: This is nuts.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What is your weapon?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay, you know what? That's enough. Because...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hey, this is none of your business.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey. It is my business when it happens at work.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Guess what? Not happening at work.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yes!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: We're gonna do it outside.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Outside of work.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: None of your business.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: None of your business then. [Dwight and Andy high five] Good. So what weapon?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: My bare hands.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That is stupid. I will use a sword and I will cut off your bare hands.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Then I'll get something too.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: I've had two men fight over me before. Usually it's over which one gets to hold the camcorder.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Angela, you have to put a stop to this right now.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [thinks for a moment] I will respect the results of the duel.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Of course you will.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: I call loser!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I will be taking my break at 4:00 in the parking lot.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I will also be talking my break at the exact same time and in the same location.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [softly] What a coincidence.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Mm.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: So, I either get more involved, or I take a sick day... leaving Dwight in charge. Oh God.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [collects Dwight's weapons from around the office; holds up a hand scythe]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [innocently] How'd that get there?

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: There's a star-shaped thing taped under the kitchen table.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Thanks Meredith.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: So I was in the office, and I look over to our Accounting division, and there is Kevin Malone. Kevin is wearing a jacket that I've never seen before. And I call over to Kevin, "Kevin, is that a tweed jacket?" And he looks at me and he says, "Michael, yes it is a tweed jacket." And I look back at him and I say, "I feel the need!... The need for tweed."

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: It's hard to try and evaluate yourself, Michael, but I appreciate you trying. [gets up] And thanks for coming in.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [rises] Oh, thank you.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I have to say, I am so impressed with the potential you see in me.

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay. [sits back down to continue eating]

Quote.Speaker: David
Quote.Text: [opens his office door] Yeah, finish up.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [shouting] Come on! Where are you? Let's do this thing! Come on! Come on out!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [watching from the conference room] I can't believe they're gonna fight over me.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: I guess people have fewer choices as they get older.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Come on!

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Hey, has anything happened yet?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Where are you?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Mm-mm. It's 4:10, I don't think he's gonna show.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Oh come on, man! Believe in something.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Come on, coward! Where are you? Where... [spots a note attached to the bushes; goes to read it] "From the desk of Andrew Bernard." [scoffs] A note. Pathetic. "Dear Dwight, by now you have received my note. How are you? I am well. You are no doubt wondering why I have left this note. It has come to my attention that in any physical match with you, I would surely be bested." True. "The soft underbelly of my refined upbringing is my soft underbelly..." [as Dwight continues to read, Andy drives around the corner very slowly]

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: There's Andy, he's in his car. You guys, what is he doing?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Why isn't Dwight turning around?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: The Prius is silent if he keeps it under five miles per hour. He deserves the win.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [still reading] Alas, after much consideration and deliberation...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh my God!

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: What's happening?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Andy's running over Dwight with his car.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Whoa! What are you! Hey! Hey!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Everyone watching
Quote.Text: Oh!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Come on! Ow! Ah! Aah!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You give up?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Never! [hits Andy's car with his bike chain] Get out and face me like a man!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I am a man! I'm a bigger man than you'll ever be! I would never sleep with another man's fiance!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You're not a man! You don't know how to take care of her! [hits his car with the bike chain] All you do is dress fancy and sing. [imitating Andy] "La la la la la la la la la la!" What does that mean? You can't even protect her!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Protect her from what? Bears, you idiot? When's the last time you saw a damn bear in Scranton?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Last year, idiot! [hits his car with the bike chain]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Dwight! Are your legs broken?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No. My right one's falling asleep a little bit.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Andy, are you all right?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Go away, Tuna! I'm winning this!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah, back off. This isn't your fight. Oh, how much is this gonna cost? [hits his car with the bike chain] Oh! What? Trust fund will take care of that! [hits his car with the bike chain]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What did you say? I'm sorry, I couldn't hear you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I sa- [Andy honks his horn]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What? You stupid idiot! [Andy honks his horn] You're like, you're like a Sasquatch! You live in the woods...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Sasquatches are the strongest animal on the planet! So fine, call me a Sasquatch!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I don't get it! How can she be sleeping with you this whole time and only sleep with me twice?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: She's sleeping with you?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I'm her fiance.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: She said she was only sleeping with me.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [enters, followed by Dwight, and makes a call] Yes, hi, my last name is Bernard, and I would like to cancel a wedding cake that I had ordered. B-E-R, N-A, R-D. Yeah, the one shaped like a sailboat... Yep, that's the one.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [picks up his bobblehead and throws it in the trash can]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Thank you. [hangs up]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Wow, what a day! Haha! I thought I was gong to get chewed out, but, hold on! Here's an attaboy for ya! What? Rollercoaster ride! Rollercoaster! It just goes to show, you leave Scranton, exciting things can happen. [sighs] Ahh!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [as Jim is collecting weapons, runs to the couch near reception and pulls out a crossbow; Jim catches him and he hands it over]
